description:
IceWM-3.5.0 window manager rolls out new features for theme installation and enriched address bar functionality.

The post IceWM 3.5.0: With Focus on Usability and System Compatibility appeared first on Linux Today.
title: IceWM 3.5.0: With Focus on Usability and System Compatibility

description:
Linux hardware vendor TUXEDO Computers unveiled today the 6th generation of the TUXEDO Stellaris Slim 15 Linux-powered laptop as a thin and lightweight gaming ultrabook focusing on high performance.

The post Meet TUXEDO Stellaris Slim 15 Gen6, a Thin and Light Linux Gaming Ultrabook appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Meet TUXEDO Stellaris Slim 15 Gen6, a Thin and Light Linux Gaming Ultrabook

description:
The KDE Gear 24.05 app collection has been released with new features in Dolphin, Elisa, Kdenlive, and NeoChat.

The post KDE Gear 24.05 Apps Collection Rolls Out, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KDE Gear 24.05 Apps Collection Rolls Out, Here’s What’s New

description:
MarkNote 1.2 enhanced KDE note-taking with rich text, custom folders, sorting options, and markdown editing.

The post KDE’s MarkNote 1.2 Note-Taking App Released appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KDE’s MarkNote 1.2 Note-Taking App Released

description:
Mesa 24.1 is out, and the graphics team at Collabora has been working hard to bring a slew of new features and bug fixes to Panfrost, Zink, NVK, and Mesa in general. Let’s take a look at the contributions made by Collabora for this release cycle.

The post Mesa 24.1 brings new hardware support for Arm and NVIDIA GPUs appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Mesa 24.1 brings new hardware support for Arm and NVIDIA GPUs

description:
Dubbed Noble Numbat, Ubuntu 24.04 LTS introduces several new features and improvements, such as the Linux kernel 6.8 for better hardware support, the latest GNOME 46 desktop environment, a new Mesa graphics stack for better gaming, as well as some of the most recent GNU/Linux technologies.

The post You Can Now Upgrade Ubuntu 23.10 to Ubuntu 24.04 LTS, Here’s How appeared first on Linux Today.
title: You Can Now Upgrade Ubuntu 23.10 to Ubuntu 24.04 LTS, Here’s How
